00610 inline LangTypes::language_t
00611 OldGenericMapHeader::getNativeLanguage(uint32 i) const
00612 {
00613    if (i < getNbrNativeLanguages())
00614       return (LangTypes::language_t(m_nativeLanguages->getElementAt(i)));
00615    else
00616       return (LangTypes::invalidLanguage);
00617 }

00629 inline StringTable::stringCode 
00630 OldGenericMapHeader::getCurrency(uint32 i) const
00631 {
00632    if (i < getNbrCurrencies())
00633       return (StringTable::stringCode(m_currency->getElementAt(i)));
00634    else
00635       return (StringTable::NOSTRING);
